text:
="preserve">Ezio Vendrame (21 November 1947 – 4 April 2020) was an Italian writer, manager, and footballer, who played as a midfielder. He was born in Casarsa della Delizia, Province of Pordenone, Italy. He was known for playing for Lanerossi Vicenza, Napoli and Padova.
Vandrame died on 4 April 2020 in Treviso, Italy of cancer at the age of 72.
